column1: share on facebookshare on twittershare on emailmore sharing services. music by the piano brothers express sympathy condolences photos cecil lee saunders 72 died thursday, june 11, 2015 at his home. funeral service will be held at 3:00 pm sunday, june 14, 2015 at rock hill friends church, with the reverend david roudabush officiating. burial will follow in the church cemetery. the family will receive friends beginning at 2:00 pm prior to the service and at other times at the home. cecil loved his family and spending time with them, especially the grandchildren. he enjoyed gardening, selling his produce, fishing, music and his dog, banjo. cecil worked at proctor silex and as a mechanic. cecil was a son of the late orlendo thomas and minnie latham saunders . he was preceded in death by brother: johnny saunders; sisters:louise ray and virginia saunders. cecil is survived by his wife of 51 years, brenda, of the home; son: greg saunders, of asheboro; daughter: angela rouse and husband darrell, of eagle springs; grandchildren: heather and ashley sullivan; great-grandchildren: korey and destini greene, corrina and chloe cox; sisters: iris owens, canary kennedy; brothers: lonnie saunders, bobby saunders, clyde saunders, gary sanders.. kennedy funeral home is assisting the saunders family condolences may be made to pinesfunerals. com click to send flowers using our local area florist direct website to florist ordering, saving on wire fees view/sign the condolence book. you have items in your basket. click here to review and/or checkout order directly from our recommended local area florist via our website and save on wire service fees and delivery charges to our funeral home. browse selection. send chocolates. express your condolences by sending a beautiful selection of chocolates, handcrafted in the usa. browse selection. veteran flag cases. we are proud to offer the finest heirloom-quality products to the families of our nation's veterans. browse products. bereavement productsa collection of books and bereavement products carefully designed to assist with the grieving process. browse products click the button to generate a printable document containing all condolences submittedcondolence booklet. pam & alan davidson posted fri june 12, 2015 angie so sorry for your loss. you & your family are in my prayers. john and ann eldridge posted sat june 13, 2015 brenda, thinking of you and your family at this time of sadness. may god bless and hold you close. add condolence
